title: A significant tract of land is being cleared on the northwest corner of the intersection of Interstate 140 and US Highway 17 near Poplar Grove. What is being planned for this tract?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/why-are-they-clearing-land-on-the-northwest-corner-of-i-140-and-u-s-17/
